response.body: <readResponse> <movie id="1" title="ACADEMY DINOSAUR" year="2006" /> <movie id="2" title="ACE GOLDFINGER" year="2006" /> <movie id="3" title="ADAPTATION HOLES" year="2006" /> <movie id="4" title="AFFAIR PREJUDICE" year="2006" /> <movie id="5" title="AFRICAN EGG" year="2006" /> <movie id="6" title="AGENT TRUMAN" year="2006" /> <movie id="7" title="AIRPLANE SIERRA" year="2006" /> <movie id="8" title="AIRPORT POLLOCK" year="2006" /> <movie id="9" title="ALABAMA DEVIL" year="2006" /> <movie id="10" title="ALADDIN CALENDAR" year="2006" /> </readResponse>
